name: Brian Blevins
text:
If you need to rent a dumpster at a reasonable price to clean out your garage or do spring cleaning, give them a call. They have dumpsters in various sizes and can assist you in finding the right size for your needs. Also great for remodeling projects too! The rental is for 7 days, so you can take your time and includes free drop-off and pickup. They will even place wood boards on the ground to avoid damage to you driveway or yard before placing the dumpster on top!

Their customer service is outstanding and will work with you to make sure you are happy with your rental. If you need to keep the dumpster for a extra day or two, they can arrange that too. One call is all it takes. Their prices cannot be beat and no one can match their customer service. They are one of the very few companies I enjoy doing business with. I will recommend them to family and friends if they ever require a dumpster rental! Give them a call!

text: I had been put in a very unfair position of being asked to leave a rental house that I had been in for over six years, Never been late on rent payment and increased the value of the owners home, due to the upkeep of the yard. I was working on a seemingly impossible deadline and when I called Bin There Dump That, The woman that answered the phone was incredibly helpful, understanding and kind. She said they could have it delivered as soon as I wanted, she gave me the rates which I thought were very reasonable and said if anything changed just to give her a call and let her know. The bin was delivered on time, very clean and ready to use. The guy who delivered it was very helpful in showing me how everything worked and letting me know the details of what to do. When it came to the last day, I made a phone call and ask if there was a possibility that I could have it one extra day and they accommodated with no problems. I can’t say enough about the staff. Everyone that I have dealt with that has anything to do with Bin There Dump That, has been above my expectations, very accommodating and extremely professional. name: Stephanie Matthews
text: After hurricane Sally came through. My mom and dad had a huge tree fall into their yard blocking the road. My mom and dad are not able to cut down trees nor did they have the equipment to do so. I even went to every store possible looking for a chainsaw,but no luck .saw someone online recommended John so i called and left a voicemail with my current situation. He had called me back withing 15 minutes or so and came by to look at what all needed to be done. After looking at the tree he said he would be back to cut ot down but he needed to get his tractor. John texted and told me he was on the way to cut it down. He showed up and used his chainsaw to cut the tree amd also moved it out of the road for my parents. He is such a blessing and a dedicated hard worker. My parents were so relieved and thankful for this stranger that didn't know us to take his time and use his machine to come and take care of this mess for my family. We are truly greatful and if anyone ever needs anything done make sure to make john your first choice. I promise you will not be disappointed. Thank you again John! You are a blessing.
